feature.label: AnswerPluginFeature
feature.description: Utilize our Eclipse plugin to effortlessly retrieve answers for any selected text within your commented code by simply selecting and clicking the 'AnswerPlugin' icon located in the toolbar.
feature.copyright: Access answers for selected text in commented code effortlessly using our Eclipse plugin—just select and click the 'AnswerPlugin' icon in the toolbar.
feature.license: Enjoy the benefits of our Eclipse plugin for free—no license required! Simply select your text within commented code and click the 'AnswerPlugin' icon in the toolbar to access answers effortlessly.
